name: ztbcms-docs
description: Library and cmd utility to generate GitBooks

scripts.deploy: cd docs/.vuepress/dist && git init . && git add -A . && git commit -m 'Build' && git remote add origin https://e.coding.net/gzztb/ztbcms/docs.git && git checkout -b dist && git push -f origin dist
scripts.buildAndDeploy: npm run build && npm run deploy

author: Jayin Ton
